FuncDef: The set boot password command is used to set or change the password of the Boot menu.

ParaDef.Info:
Slot id.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: Info: Setting the boot password is successful.
Info: The password was changed successfully.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To set or modify the boot menu password of a device, run this command.
 The supported password length is 6-255. The password must contain at least two types of the following characters: Uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, and special characters. Special characters cannot contain question marks (?) or spaces.
